articles.author: Manjiri Chitre
articles.title: ‘PM Modi is the boss’: Why Australia's Albanese mentioned Bruce Springsteen - Hindustan Times
articles.description: PM Modi was greeted with a traditional welcome, including Vedic chanting as he arrived at Sydney's Qudos Bank Arena. | Latest News India
articles.content: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese on Tuesday called his counterpart Prime Minister Narendra Modi the boss while addressing the community event in Sydney for the Indian diaspora. Albanese's r… [+1144 chars]
